column2: Experimental J&J; psoriasis drug shows promise in study March 22 An experimental Johnson & Johnson  drug for moderate to severe psoriasis proved significantly better at clearing the scaly
column3: uncomfortable skin patches associated with the disease than a placebo
column4: according to data from a midstage study presented on Saturday.

column2: U.S. GAO report recommends assessment of F-35 software WASHINGTON
column3: March 21 Congressional auditors have joined the Pentagon's chief arms tester in raising concerns about the pace of development of software on Lockheed Martin Corp's new F-35 fighter jet and recommended the military's F-35 program office assess the plane's ability to integrate specific weapons by July.
